column4: hello everyone, i have a serious problem with my ubuntu install, i can't login anymore
it just keeps going back to the login screen
When I try to login I keep going back to the login screen, anybody an idea?
Make sure you don't have a tab in your password :)
Hmm...
Why not?
Oh. Well, that might be a framebuffer problem in addition to the login problem.
Have you tried changing to a different session, like the failsafe xterm?
i tried all sessions available
oh dear.
You can't really do anything if you can't log in with gdm and you can't get to a terminal.
You'll have to restart, and do something to get a terminal.
and then?
Do you have a vga= on your modeline?
Look at ~/.xsession-errors
Ah. In that case yes, just look at that file, and see what it says.
the .xsession-errors is empty
Oh.
Are you running edgy?
I'll be in ubuntu+1 if you want to go there, even though there usually aren't to many people to help there.
Yes, you probably should join #ubuntu+1
